response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it is valued at $15,000 to me. However, considering its significance to you, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This represents a substantial saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to hearing your decision soon.", "product_price": 12000}
